name: Rivengard
summary: Rivengard is a new tactical RPG using the evergreen turn-based mechanics made famous by classics such as Heroes of Might and Magic, and perfecting them for mobile play. Players collect high-fantasy heroes, each with their unique abilities and traits, and put their tactical skills to the test on the battlefield. Those who assemble the strongest line-ups of heroes and master their unique tactics will rise to the top of the leaderboards.
